item.title: I’m Not Convinced Ethical Generative AI Currently Exists
item.description: WIRED’s advice columnist considers whether some AI tools are more ethical than others, and if developers can make AI wiser.

item.title: Tubi Is Not the Next Netflix. It’s Something Better
item.description: The ad-supported service is home to the biggest content library of any streamer. So why is Tubi still considered a social punching bag?

item.title: How One AI Startup Founder Cornered Microsoft Into Finally Taking Down Explicit Videos of Her
item.description: Breeze Liu has been a prominent advocate for victims. But even she struggled to scrub nonconsensual intimate images and videos of herself from the web...
